description:
Install instructionsINSTRUCTIONS 

Steps to play game

4)CLICK THE ZIP FILE NAMED : lost in love.zip 

5) THEN EXTRACT IT IN FOLDER mobilegameengine/projects 

6)OPEN MAX 2D YOU WILL SEE MY GAME

Enjoy The Game
